title: Van hmun ropui pelin
lyrics:
Van hmun ropui pelin,
A lo kal sualna karah;
Khawvel hreawm a tuar ani,
Aw, ka Lal, i va riang em ve aw!

A pianna tlawm mahse,
Ka chhandamtu ani;
Chawimawi nan hla i sa ang.

Khawvel a hmangaih a,
Chungnung ber a inngaitlawm;
A hmangaihna a zau em e,
Fak rawh u, Haleluia, Amen.

Lei anchhedawng hnu hi,
Chatuana nunna min pe;
Van khua nen lung kan rual ang a,
Rem leng se, tiin kan zai tawh ang.

Lalpa hmangaihna hi,
Khawvel hmun zauvah puang r'u;
Lei anchhedawng tahna ram hi,
Hmangaihnain lo khat thuai rawh se.
